short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the "Includes paid promotion" banner on YouTube thumbnails

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop misclicking the "Includes paid promotion" banner and opening an unwanted support page. Forget about losing the video you wanted to watch after clicking "Go back" in your browser. 
Unfortunately, YouTube doesn't have an option to turn this banner off. This extension removes it from your interface.

It hides this banner only for you. So, please don't expect to remove this notification from your videos for other users. It only enhances the YouTube experience in your browser.

This extension is free* 
   *your donations are welcome:
   https://www.buymeacoffee.com/Dm.3
   https://www.patreon.com/dm3
